survey_brief: This survey aims to identify the professional development needs and preferences of employees to tailor training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?

questions.question_text: Which of the following professional development areas are most relevant to your current role? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following professional development areas are most relevant to your current role? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option. Ensure mobile-friendly design.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development activities?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in professional development activities? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option. Ensure options are comprehensive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in professional development activities? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's professional development programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring likelihood. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's professional development programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What specific skills or knowledge areas would you like to see covered in future professional development programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: What specific skills or knowledge areas would you like to see covered in future professional development programs?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your manager supports your participation in professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge managerial support. Use a Likert scale for nuanced responses.

script.question_text: Do you feel that your manager supports your participation in professional development activities?

questions.question_text: How do you prefer to receive notifications about upcoming professional development opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option. Ensure mobile-friendly design.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: How do you prefer to receive notifications about upcoming professional development opportunities?

questions.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding professional development at your organization?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any additional feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough.

script.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding professional development at your organization?
